snippet: The Democratic mayoral candidate William C. Thompson Jr. said that it was time for Raymond W. Kelly, the popular police commissioner, to “make a decision.”
abstract: Speculation that New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly will seek a mayoral bid is intensifying as area Republicans urge him to run; Democratic candidate William C Thompson Jr says it is time for the commissioner to make a decision, as political talk is distracting him from fighting crime.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic mayoral candidate William C. Thompson Jr. said that it was time for Raymond W. Kelly, the popular police commissioner, to “make a decision.”

headline.seo: Will Raymond W. Kelly Run for Mayor? One Candidate Tires of Talk
headline.main: Will Kelly Run for Mayor? One Candidate Tires of Talk
headline.print_headline: Will Kelly Run for Mayor? One Candidate Tires of Talk
